meanings.definition: Resembling a goat in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The goatlike creature had a shaggy coat and a playful demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The farm had many goatlike animals roaming around freely.
meanings.sent3: The goatlike antics of the children at play made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness was as goatlike as his, refusing to budge from her position.
meanings.sent5: The goatlike horns on the helmet made the warrior look fierce and intimidating.
